articles.title: Covid-19 surges will prolong South-East Asia's job crisis, says ILO - The Star Online
articles.description: Rising Covid-19 cases and a slow pace of vaccinations will likely prolong the labor-market crisis in South-East Asia and hamper the region’s recovery, according to the International Labour Organisation (ILO).

articles.title: 34-year-old Singaporean doctor dies after 8-year battle with epilepsy - AsiaOne
